Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.

lenders.name: Nathalie

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I run a small business myself in addition to working a full time pharmaceutical sales job for the worlds largest pharma company.  No sale makes you feel the same as knowing you are helping a motivated entrepreneur in need get one step closer to what we know as "the american dream", it helps me sleep at night :) !
lenders.occupational_info: I help people by visiting doctors offices and hospitals and giving them free samples of our drugs for their pts. in need.  I also try to educate the doctors as to the differences between drugs they are using (how well they work, cost to patient, side effects, etc...)  As a hobby and source of extra income I started my own website as a way of marketing the horses that I am breeding and training on my 20 acre farm.  I try to sell a couple horses a year that are show-jumping horses for a little extra money to pay the farm bills.

lenders.name: Scott & Donna
lenders.loan_because: We like to give a helping hand, not a hand out.

lenders.occupation: General Electric Nuclear Fuels, PMQC Inspector
lenders.loan_because: My mother is from Mexico and I have seen firsthand how poor some of her family is and the Mexican population overall.  Had she not met my father, who was in the military, she would very likely be living the same kind of life.  I have been blessed with a good job and feel the need to share my good fortune.  I wish all the business men and women the very best and hope you will have a better life with the help of Kiva. org.  God bless you all.  Glenda

lenders.name: Beata
lenders.loan_because: I am too lucky, too blessed to have everything I already do. It is time to share it with those who have little or sometimes nothing at all. And it really does feel better to give than to receive :)

lenders.name: craig

lenders.occupational_info: i write and create greeting cards that fall under the category of adult humor.

lenders.loan_because: It's a great feeling!
lenders.occupational_info: I work on medical software.

lenders.name: Donna

i want to help.

lenders.occupational_info: work in an acute care hospital where i care and advocate for patients needs.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently finishing my bachelor degree in anthropology and hope to get a job as an ESL instructor in Japan and then grad school.

lenders.name: Stephan & Ronlyn
lenders.loan_because: Micro-lending has proven to be a seriously productive and positive way for an individual to reach out and help others.
lenders.occupational_info:
I do research, and write about my exploration of that  part of us unlimited by space or time. My papers, books, and electronic media can found at my personal website listed below. I also study and write about the trends that are shaping the cultures of the world, and our collective future. My daily web publication on this aspect of my work can be found at:
www.schwartzreport.net. My bi-monthly essays appear in the journal Explore:  www.explorejournal.com/content/schwartz

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: Luke 6:20-21 “Blessed are you who are poor, for yours is the kingdom of God. Blessed are you who hunger now, for you shall be satisfied. Blessed are you who weep now, for you shall laugh.”
lenders.occupational_info: Jesus, help me do your will, promote your glory and advance your kingdom.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: Just because a person is born in a particular country, or into a particular family, should not condemn him to poverty for life.
lenders.occupational_info: currently without employment--by choice

lenders.name: Lorie
lenders.loan_because: I can.  If one has, one should give.  I have, therefore, I give.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can, and because I hope it will do some good.
lenders.occupational_info: I work part-time as a consultant to companies and individuals on information technology issues and a variety of general business problems.

lenders.name: Kathy & David
lenders.occupation: Medical Office Management / Small Business Owners
lenders.loan_because: Because we can. We love the stories and the drive that people have to succeed.  Kiva gives us an opportunity to share some of our success with others in need of a helping hand.

lenders.name: molly
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy passing on blessings to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I've taught elementary school in a rural area of Mississippi for the past eighteen years.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: As a Canadians we have so many advantages that are unimaginable to so many people. It is my honour and privilege to help others improve their lives.

lenders.name: Edd
lenders.loan_because: I think that no matter how difficult life is for us, others have it even more difficult.

lenders.name: Raymond
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in Kenya, and this is a great way to help my home country
lenders.occupational_info: I am a career coach, helping professionals managing their careers. I work principally in New York and Washington DC with the top lawyers in the USA

lenders.name: Mina
lenders.loan_because: Well it says it right there on the main page.  They are "loans that change lives".  What an easy way to leave a positive mark behind.  Everyone who can should be doing this! I believe that people don't need a hand out, they need a hand up and others to believe in them and they will know what to do to better their own lives.  KIVA allows me to make a positive difference in the lives of many people around the world, while at the same time letting people go after their own goals with their own hard work.  My brothers let me know about KIVA and one of them sent me an invitation and I have been loving it ever since!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital for the computer department.  I work with a lot of great people in my department and at the hospital.  My workplace also changes people's lives :) Guess it's trend for me. he heh

lenders.name: kate
lenders.loan_because: It feels great to connect with the larger world.
lenders.occupational_info: As a midwife I support families with newborn babies as a potter I play with clay and bring my wares to market==that is understandable anywhere in the world!

lenders.name: Alexandre
lenders.loan_because: It's good to help people make their own way

lenders.name: nancy
lenders.loan_because: We all can make a differance ,even though we think it is small
lenders.occupational_info: I own a storage facility. It is rows of rooms for people to put in their possesions if they don't have room in their home

lenders.name: amy jane.
lenders.loan_because: “What we do for ourselves dies with us.  What we do for others and the world remains and is immortal.”  - Albert Pine
lenders.occupational_info: i am a cloud-computing marketeer for a boston-based technology company.

lenders.name: Daniela
lenders.loan_because: As a second-generation Mexican immigrant, I'm very grateful for what I have achieved through the contributions of others.  It's my social obligation to "pay it forward" and help others reach their greatest potential by helping to remove barriers in their paths.
lenders.occupational_info: I help migrant agricultural farmworkers improve their lives and our political systems by empowering workers through client-directed education, community building, policy making and legal strategizing.

lenders.name: Shea & Cleo
lenders.loan_because:
Everyone needs a helping hand. 
It is not a hand-out 
but a hand-up!!!
:-)
lenders.occupational_info:
Shea works with electronics and 
Cleo (wife) works with at-risk children

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I like helping others
lenders.occupational_info: I help the sick and injured.

lenders.name: Darren
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people out.
lenders.occupational_info: I write and perform music.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: The only way the world will work is if everyone supports everyone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired civil rights lawyer, and now I am a writer and a model.

lenders.name: Dianne
lenders.loan_because: ...I can.  I loan to the fish sellers because my mom is a fisherwoman.  And I loan to the vegetable mongers because I wish I were among them.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: joey
lenders.loan_because: ...I am part of the most affluent culture in the history of humanity...
lenders.occupational_info: I capture people's stories and share them with as many people as I can

lenders.name: Chrissy
lenders.loan_because: I have enough to share, and so it just makes sense.

lenders.name: Natalee
lenders.loan_because: "Every mikkle mek a muckle" - Jamaican proverb which means "every little bit counts."

lenders.name: Elissa
lenders.occupation: Web Developer and Fused glass designer
lenders.loan_because: I know I am fortunate and want to help others reach their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large company on their Web site. Web sites, like Kiva.com, have a lot of people who work on making pictures, gathering content, writing content, and keeping the most up to date information on the site. This is what I do.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us so we can be a blessing to others.
lenders.occupational_info: Our business works similar to Amazon.com's affiliate marketing program.

lenders.name: MARILYN
lenders.loan_because: I WANT TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN SOMEONES LIFE.  TO HELP THEM BETTER THEIR CIRCUMSTANCES

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I admire people who are brave enough to run a business and make or sell something that they have made.  I think it takes a lot of courage.
lenders.occupational_info: I help children who have a hard time learning in school by helping their teachers, giving advice to their parents, and helping them get extra time with special education teachers.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: We all need a little help from time to time.God loves us all.....
lenders.occupational_info: I make beds and cushions for big pleasure boats.Sometimes we do curtains too

lenders.name: thevirgos
lenders.loan_because: There is nothing greater than the feeling of being in control of your destiny.  Empowering people to change their lives allows them to make their dreams come true.

lenders.name: Friends in Holladay Utah
lenders.loan_because: For Christmas gifts I give my children and my neighbors and loan to Kiva in their name.
lenders.occupational_info: I do many different jobs.  I work in the mornings in a large office and I manage a Villa in Mexico using the internet.  Then I visit the Villa 4 or 5 times a year.  In the afternoon I do design work.  I design cabinets for homes.  Sometimes I do Photography I specialize in taking photos of children.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a great way to help people.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to make a living and raise children.  I wish someone had helped me when I was younger.  I think this is a great thing and it makes me feel good to help someone else.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: It's my goal in life to help others that ned it.  I want to give back to the community.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: Its such a little thing to do..hope it helps.

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a help to someone who is deserving and trying to accomplish something in this life
lenders.occupational_info: Rewarding, very busy and Helpful to women.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: It helps me to feel connected to something greater than myself.  Micro-loans are incredible because they allow you to have a direct impact on someone's life you otherwise may have never known about.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a company who's mission is to provide financial solutions for a lifetime.  On a day to day basis I am focused on helping educate and provide solutions to our clients so they can feel confident and protected in their financial future.

lenders.name: James & Shannon
lenders.loan_because: We want to pass along the blessing that we have received. We hope to improve someone's life so that they can pass it on to others.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I joined Kiva.org because there have been times in my life that I have needed financial help and have been fortunate to find someone generous enough to offer a loan to me to when the banks and almighty credit score said “no”.  At times it was a total stranger, and at times it was a friend.  Because of these experiences in my life, I have a genuine understanding of how it feels to have a dream or a goal that is harnessed and held back by the lack of this thing we call money.   In recent years my financial situation has stabilized so now I am giving back what I can to those who are making an effort to improve themselves and improve the quality of their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large telecommunications corporation weekdays then on weekends have my own small business which sells and installs products. Once I install the products, I program the house to suit the owner's need by turning their house into smarthome.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: Giving is the way to make the world connected not only financially but on a karmic level. Pay it forward.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people and what can be done when monetary resources are made available on a micro-economic level.
lenders.occupational_info: University administration.

lenders.name: Dario & Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: It's a simple way to make a difference in the life of someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: Dario trains new recruiters for a national IT staffing industry. Stephanie recruits engineers for positions throughout the US Mid-Atlantic region.

lenders.name: jill
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of something that operates out of compassion for others
lenders.occupational_info: I no longer teach but I was a Science teacher

lenders.name: Ayiesha
lenders.loan_because: I am so lucky and so grateful to be able to help

lenders.name: ngungo
lenders.loan_because: of others: khongquan, yenchi.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.occupational_info: I help grow ideas from entrepreneurs

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to model global citizenship.  Every day I challenge young people in my school district stand up and make a difference - this is a tool that I can use to transform lives as part of a greater community.

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.loan_because: The ability to earn money is a gift from god and one should share that and all gifts.  - John D. Rockerfeller
lenders.occupational_info: Computer Software Sales

lenders.name: AL
lenders.loan_because: This is the way to bring about "REAL" change in people's lives. By giving them a HAND-UP, they will  better their lives and hopefully they will pass their good fortune forward, and so we change the face of poverty one person at a time. Some may think this way is futile or it is not making enough of an impact. I say, look at all the money that has been donated to the poor worldwide... has there been real change? No !! This is the way to go. Help people help themselves.There is self pride and the feeling of accomplishment by the entrepreneur.

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: It is one way that one person can help.  Not a hand out, but truly a hand-up.

lenders.name: Alexina
lenders.loan_because: I believe in abundance, not scarcity.  I believe in the inherent worth and dignity of all people, and giving a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a very busy surgical unit at a large metropolitan hospital in Washington, DC.  I gladly serve people from all walks of life.

lenders.name: Cathy Renee
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance and to be a part of that is exciting and a blessing!

lenders.name: Elm Middle School
lenders.loan_because: We're interested in people around the world.

lenders.name: Dee Dee
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel wonderful.
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching people how to be exceptional customer service representatives is what I do best and I love to share it as a consultant.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to support themselves and their families.  This gives me an opportunity to give my blessings back to others.

lenders.name: The Puglisi Family
lenders.loan_because: Because I know how it is to be with out money
lenders.occupational_info: Out of work right now .... Depressed but still love to help people

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.occupation: Sr. Admin Asst in Biotech Co.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.occupation: Executive Assistant to CEO, Senior Partners
lenders.loan_because: It is important to help people trying to make their way and provide for their families, particularly women in country torn by rebellion and war.
lenders.occupational_info: I support the senior partners in an asset management company now.  I worked in the public sector for 30 years in womens issues, politics, union organizing, and health care.

lenders.name: Tricia
lenders.loan_because: How can I not? No matter how little I think I have, it is an abundance compared to some.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I think helping someone else achieve their dreams and goals is a wonderful thing. With all the chaos going on in the world it makes me feel good that I can contribute something to someone as a selfless act and maybe change their lives in return.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in the US, majoring in criminal justice with a minor in forensic science. I am currently a sophomore and I plan to attend law school once I receive my bachelor's degree. Once out of law school I would like to work for the UN and be able to address human rights which is very important to me personally.

lenders.name: Kay
lenders.loan_because: it takes such a small amount of money to help some one acheive their financial goals.

lenders.name: Nelson & Pat
lenders.loan_because: We care!
lenders.occupational_info:
Nelson-- Retired Ford motor Co.
Pat--Retired Hospice Nurse

lenders.name: Erin & Kaylie
lenders.loan_because: To be a blessing to others

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.occupation: AE for a global graphics company
lenders.loan_because: I love this idea of people from all over the world helping others...no borders, no boundries.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: life has been good to me and opportunity, sought and found, has come without pain.  It is time to give to others and keep Karma flowing.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a restaurant in Delaware (the US) and I run an IT and Management Consulting firm.

lenders.name: Patrick and Tara
lenders.loan_because: We feel like we are funding something tangible

lenders.name: belinda
lenders.loan_because: It is a wonderful feeling to help someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people breath better

lenders.name: Lenny
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled to third world countries . We have seen how those who have so little . We know when you can help how happy they are to get ahead working to make life better.
lenders.occupational_info:
We worked with AIDS for 20 years . Now we work in a free medical group. 
We feel that helping those who need makes life a little better for all.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Luke
lenders.loan_because: It just makes sense.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping those in need. Better to give than to receive.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I'm stuck in the U.S. military (not a great choice for me). Someday I want to be involved with organic agriculture.

lenders.name: Mallory
lenders.loan_because:
I can and I care,
Everyone deserves a chance at a good and stable future, and this allows me to help others get just that. :)
lenders.occupational_info: I attend school and hope to work in film and tv one day.

lenders.name: Chiong Mei
lenders.loan_because: my owner wishes to remain anonymous. He was lucky enough to be born in the United States where resources to give to others are plentiful.
lenders.occupational_info: My owner earned a degree in Human Studies and have spent the last 8 years helping homeless people, people with HIV/AIDS and victims of Physical and Sexual Violence.

lenders.name: Jessie
lenders.loan_because: A small way to help someone.

lenders.name: Emile
lenders.loan_because: I just wanted to help someone, we are so blessed and I can't find a better way !!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people acheive their finanacial goals !!

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: my life has been blessed and I want to give back.  People living in developing countries don't have as many opportunities as we do in the US and I would love to help provide them with a little boost towards achieving financial stability.  We tend to get caught up in our pampered lives and forget how little it takes to make a difference in the lives of people that are less fortunate than us.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to be without. And struggling to make ends meet. My parents never seemed to get ahead, and I find that I am able to help others. As my husband and I have done well for ourselves and feel that we can do this.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to work for the federal government until this passed June when my husband and I decided to retire early and have some us time.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: This is one of the coolest things I've seen. What an amazing way to lend a hand to someone so far away. (2nd loan is because I play tennis!)

lenders.name: Nellie
lenders.loan_because: It's a way for me to do a little more globally.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a community psychologist in training.

lenders.name: Angie
lenders.loan_because: I want people to be able to have a better quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and sell jewelry and I also paint watercolor portraits of people.

lenders.name: regina
lenders.occupation: house wife,trying to set up home business
lenders.loan_because: i would like to help others and also help myself
lenders.occupational_info: im a  57 year old  born may 8th 1950 ,widowed military wife and my husband died of MS  i also have 5 kids all are adults now but they are still my big babies an i love them to death

lenders.name: Sarah & Adam
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we can. We were especially inspired by the wonderful people we met on our travels to Southeast Asia.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I care about people and I love the idea that by giving a small amount of money I am able to assist someone in getting on their feet and being able to start their own business to take care of their families

lenders.name: Keren
lenders.loan_because: What is better than helping others help themselves? I want my 3 boys to grow up in a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a very nice spa, helping people relax and feel happy, performing services like facials, make-up application, and depilatory waxing (not relaxing but still beautifying).

lenders.name: Aimee
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non profit organization providing services for those with a mental health diagnosis.  (i.e. therapy, drug and alcohol services, assisted living/shelter, links to other community services, rehabilitation services, etc...

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back. Pay it forward!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graphic designer. And I love to take photos. Its more of a hobby than anything.

lenders.name: Lyana
lenders.loan_because: my mom is a war-baby from the Vietnam War, and she always tells me how lucky we are to live here in the US. I'm lending my money from my piggy-bank to help people from my mother's country.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 5th grade student in Fair Lawn, NJ.

lenders.name: Douglass
lenders.occupation: Retired president of sucessful sales organization.
lenders.loan_because: Someone saw potential in me back in 1970 and that encouragement grew into a nationally recognized business for me and my family.
lenders.occupational_info: I have owned a company that sells road hazard safety equipment which lessens the accident rate on our highways and road construction jobs.

lenders.name: Nils Jonsson
lenders.loan_because: “So in everything, do to others what you would have them do to you, for this sums up the Law and the Prophets.” — Jesus

lenders.name: VIRGINIA
lenders.loan_because: Helping others is the right thing to do.  We are blessed to live in this country and should do what we can to help developing nations succeed.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: people have helped me in my life and I want to do the same for others, especially those trying to help and improve their lives and their families.  It ripples outward to everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I started my own business just recently.  I am a Freelance Executive Assistant/Office Manager/Bookkeeper.

lenders.name: Samir
lenders.loan_because: I feel like it.

lenders.name: The Lang Gang
lenders.loan_because: After seeing a report on Oprah I was moved to help.  These people only need such a small amount to help change their lives forever.
lenders.occupational_info: I process all incoming payments from customers for the company I work for.

lenders.name: YUMIKO
lenders.loan_because:
I love the earth.I'm falling love with 
this beautiful world.
I believe that all people will live a peaceful life.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: susan
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good and I think it may change the life of someone.

lenders.name: Toni
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I feel blessed by what we have accomplished in our lives. I came from a background of poverty and have done well so I wish to share my success with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach health promotion to college students at West Virginia University

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help single women/mothers become self sufficient.

lenders.name: Gina Hanna
lenders.loan_because: I believe that giving is what it is all about.  I am a Christian and that is what God did for us and that is what he has asked us to do for each other.  I believe it comes back in so many abundant ways.
lenders.occupational_info: I help arrange loans for people to buy houses or to refinance their current house loan.  I am also very involved in my church where I lead a drama ministry and help with the Children's ministry.

lenders.name: Pearl
lenders.loan_because: I want to help mothers take care of their families.  What greater joy is there in life then seeing smiles on your kids faces.  If my loan brings that to one mother - great!  :)
lenders.occupational_info: I sell vacation homes at a resort in Montana.

lenders.name: Dianne
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed. I have traveled to 35 countries and lived outside the US so I know first hand what the living conditions are like in other parts of the world.

lenders.name: anne
lenders.loan_because: Micro lending is such an impossibly beautiful concept, it makes this planet a much smaller and intimate place. It takes very little to create the biggest change in other peoples lives. Dignity, honor, believing in others, that doesn’t cost anything - but a few supplies to help someone believe in themselves - I can manage that.

lenders.name: Mary Ann
lenders.loan_because: I consider it "paying it forward" for all the kindnesses I have received from people.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach computers and the organization of information to students in my local community college.

lenders.name: ria
lenders.loan_because: I just wanted  to help

lenders.name: Stella
lenders.loan_because: it empowers.

lenders.name: Alisha
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this project.
lenders.occupational_info: I help children that have been abused.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is my Christian duty to help those less fortunate than I.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with disabilities be successful in college

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I am keeping my mother's gift for helping alive eventhough she has passed on.  I enjoy seeing how many women I touch on her behalf.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I think this is the best idea - that people of a variety of income levels can help fund business ventures across the world!  It makes me feel great.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide administrative services for a city bus company.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an important way to change the world, one small step at a time
lenders.occupational_info: I provide protection for architects and engineers who work in the United States, or worldwide

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: I can ....and .....I feel good about doing it.  A new blouse or helping to alleviate suffering???? It really doesn't take much.  Since I have been blessed, I need to do my share to help others.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I am such a strong believer in the power of having your own business.  I support this program because I want others to help make the world a better place by developing their own businesses and themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I coach  and train businesses and real estate agents as to how to make their businesses become more successful.

lenders.name: Kay
lenders.loan_because: My faith calls me to be in service to others.  Because my disability limits what I can do physically, making a loan to someone in need helps me to fulfill what Christ calls me to do. I have seen the success of other programs I have given to (such as the Heifer Project) and I believe helping people set up small businesses can have the same success.
lenders.occupational_info: I retired from an Information Management position on a contract with the Government Accountability Office. I analyzed and indexed GAO's reports so users could easily find reports on topics they were interested in. I also did numerous database maintenance duties. Having read numerous GAO reports on agency inefficiency and poverty programs, I am inspired by how well KIVA works.

lenders.name: The Buckner Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others striving for financial independence
lenders.occupational_info: We teach people how to make and save money

lenders.name: Natural Luxe
lenders.occupational_info: Natural Luxe specializes in natural, organic, recycled, handmade and sustainable gifts with style and substance!

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people and I believe everyone deserves a chance to seek what is positive and important to them.
lenders.occupational_info: I  help the elderly at an Assisted Living Facility and I also sell Health and Wellness products

lenders.name: Candice
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have a wonderful family and beautiful home. Sharing and giving to others that have the ability to make the world a better place makes me very happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home with my two beautiful children. I fell that its my responsibility to raise considerate and caring children so  they can also give back to the wold when they are older.

lenders.name: Our Family in
lenders.loan_because: Simple actions make a difference.  It brings us joy to think our small loan can be a blessing to someone, somewhere.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel so good to give to other people and when you give, God's return is double.  As the old saying goes, it is better to give than receive!
lenders.occupational_info: I have a wonderful husband and two healthy boys!  I also, coach 7 girls on a high school cheerleading squad.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: I Can!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a legal asisstant in a busy law office here in Wyoming. I love to loan money here in KIVA..This is a GREAT organization and I am proud to help.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: A small group of dedicated people can change the world.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I see this as a stepping stone towards making this world a better place.  We all deserve a chance to succeed.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: i can...and believe in it

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: I want to help hardworking people.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because:
Life is about Giving. 
Success is 'Significance' - making a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I coach women who are going through personal and professional transitions.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I can help people get started with businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to work programming computers.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I would like to do something that makes a difference in someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that offers evaluation services and assistance with program planning and design for human service programs.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: It''s how I can help change the world.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I am honoring a friend who requested "a random act of kindness" for her 60th  birhtday and I was fortunate enough to have someone give me a  loan to start my business 25 years ago.

lenders.name: Tammy & Keith
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in someones life.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because:
I am blessed to have the opportunity to receive an education. I want to help create opportunity for the awesome, hard-working 
entrepreneurs on this site.
lenders.occupational_info: I am pursuing my masters degree and lisence to become a MFT..

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: As a follower of Christ I am called to care for the poor, the marginalized, and the oppressed.  Giving in this capacity gives me the opportunity to share His love and help to empower those that He cares about so deeply.

lenders.name: Arlene
lenders.loan_because: It is time to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I help send people on holidays around the world.  I specialize in Africa and adventure travel.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I feel good when I help someone who is less fortunate than myself make a life for themselves and their family. Anything is possible in this world with hard work and determination. Those interested in this deserve a chance no matter what country they live in.  Strangers helping strangers - what a great idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from working. When I did work I was an office manager in a doctor's office. I love the work of medicine and helping others.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because:
I realize how blessed I am to have been born in this country. I have a great family, a supportive husband and a great job. 
I want to help others who are trying very hard to do something with their lives. Someone who may not have access to the resources available to us in this country.

lenders.name: Dee
lenders.loan_because: I want to see other entrepreneurs succeed.  It's important to support independent businesses, no matter where they are in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: My specialty is helping businesses market and promote their services, primarily thru copywriting and creative ideas.

lenders.name: Charese
lenders.loan_because: I like being able to make a big difference in someone's life with just a little amount of money. I don't have much now and hopefully someday I will be able to help more. I know that I wouldn't be where I am now without the help of student loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently in pharmacy school. I will graduate in 2010. I recently got married May. I work in one of America's top ten hospitals. I help take care of patients there by making and delivering medications. I have a big heart and enjoy helping others.

lenders.name: Lorie
lenders.loan_because: I think that this is a wonderful way to help people support themselves and their communities.  This seems so much better that just donating money to general  "assistance" organizations.
lenders.occupational_info: I purchase run-down residential properties, rehabilitate them and fix them up for new families to purchase for thier homes.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: this can really make a difference. I've seen it first hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization that does international exchange and development programs for people with disabilities

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed to have a wonderful life. I believe it is important to teach our children  to help others and give back.

lenders.name: Zak
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to get a business off the ground and how much you need others to help you.
lenders.occupational_info: I play music.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: if we all share something with each other, we will all have a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stone carver and I sell my work at a public market in Seattle Washington.

lenders.name: Mykle
lenders.loan_because: Giving makes you feel alive.
lenders.occupational_info: I help students get their college education.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I believe micro lending is the best, most viable path toward self-sufficiency and ultimately eradicating poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a volunteer (with abused children and homeless/low-income adults), a writer (freelance and children's books) and a communications consultant (writing/editing/design for different businesses' marketing pieces).
